plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and grow in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine to grow
🌳 I can be big or small
🌷 You might find me in a garden

plant.question: I'm tall and brown and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ I grow very high.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a fruit that monkeys love to peel and eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like me
💛 I am yellow
💪 You can eat me for energy

plant.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on a vine. You can make sauce out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am round and red
🇮🇹 I am often used in Italian food
🪴 I grow in gardens

plant.question: I am a flower with many colors and a long stem. People give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I smell sweet.
🌹 I come in many different colors.
🎁 People give me on special occasions.

plant.question: I am green and leafy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I'm a yummy snack for bunnies.
🥗 You can put me in a salad.
🥬 I am a type of vegetable.

plant.question: I have sharp needles instead of leaves and stay green all year round. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I'm often decorated during Christmas.
🐻 Bears like to live in forests full of me.
🌿 I am a type of evergreen tree.

plant.question: I grow underground and am orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👓 Eating me is good for your eyes.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

plant.question: I have a hard shell, white flesh, and grow on a palm tree in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow near the beach.
🥥 I have milk inside.
🌊 You might find me on a tropical island.

plant.question: I am a plant that looks like a tree but I am smaller, and I make coffee. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ My beans make a popular drink.
🌎 I grow in tropical regions.
😴 Adults drink me to wake up

cosmos.question: I am the big, bright light we see during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
☀️ I make the plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌳 I have trees and animals.
🌎 People call me home.

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I don't have my own light. I reflect the sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Sometimes I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🌙 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas, far away, twinkling in the night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ There are lots and lots of me.
🔥 I am made of burning gas.
🔭 You can see me through a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red and a planet, sometimes called the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me!
🏜️ I am covered in red dust.
🔥 I am named after a god of war.

cosmos.question: I'm the biggest planet in our solar system, with a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 That big red spot is a storm!
🪐 I am a gas giant.
🌌 I have lots and lots of moons.

cosmos.question: I am known for my beautiful rings that go all the way around. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rocks.
🪐 I am another gas giant.
🔭 You need a telescope to see my rings clearly.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
🌌 People have been using me to navigate for a long time.
🌠 I'm made up of many stars.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust, and our solar system is inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I have a spiral shape.
🌌 There are billions of stars inside me!
🥛 My name sounds like a drink we get from cows.

cosmos.question: I am a frozen ball of ice and dust that leaves a bright tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I have a very long orbit around the sun.
❄️ I am made of frozen gas and ice.
🌠 I'm sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.
